comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: P-47B serial 41-6002 flown by COL Hubert 'Hub' Zemke, commander of the 56th FG, while stationed at Mitchel Field prior to the unit's deployment to the ETO. They would leave the 'B' models Stateside, getting a mix of 'C' and early 'D' models in England.
